alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 5:20AM PST until December 27 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Southwestern Mendocino Interior and Southeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
